mapper.sql: id, frameName, `number`, factoryId, mineId, createTime, updateTime, isDelete
mapper.insert: insert into frame_setting (frameName, `number`, factoryId, mineId, createTime, updateTime, isDelete) values (#{framename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{factoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into frame_setting
frameName,
`number`,
factoryId,
mineId,
createTime,
updateTime,
isDelete,
#{framename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{factoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{mineid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update frame_setting
frameName = #{framename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
factoryId = #{factoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mineId = #{mineid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update frame_setting set frameName = #{framename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, factoryId = #{factoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mineId = #{mineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update frame_setting set isDelete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT frame_setting.id, frame_setting.frameName, frame_setting.number, frame_setting.factoryId, frame_setting.mineId, frame_setting.isDelete, frame_setting.createTime, frame_setting.updateTime, factory_house.factoryName, mine_setting.mineName FROM frame_setting, factory_house, mine_setting
frame_setting.isDelete = 0
AND ( frame_setting.frameName like #{keyWord} or frame_setting.number like #{keyWord})
AND frame_setting.factoryId = factory_house.id AND frame_setting.mineId = mine_setting.id
select id,frameName,number FROM frame_setting where factoryId=#{factoryId} AND isDelete=0
